name: Teleport
headline: The easiest, most secure way to access all your infrastructure
description: Our open source Infrastructure Access Platform helps developers and security professionals to simplify secure access to servers, Kubernetes, internal web apps, databases, and cloud provider APIs across all environments.

founders.name: Alexander Klizhentas, Founder/CTO
founders.description: I’m focusing on building distributed infrastructure systems while keeping things as simple as possible. I’m writing code and managing engineering teams, helping team members to be happy, productive and grow their technical and communication skills.

founders.name: Ev Kontsevoy, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
- CEO/cofounder Teleport
- Product at Rackspace
- CEO/cofounder Mailgun
- Software engineer

founders.name: Taylor Wakefield, Founder/COO
founders.description:
- Co-Founder of Teleport (fka, Gravitational) (S2015) and Mailgun (W2011). 
- Director at Rackspace in product for 3 years after Mailgun was acquired by Rackspace in 2012. 
- Boston College alumni.

## Why Common Access Architectures Are No Longer Enough
![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fy1ellg96%2Fproduction%2Febf7e20e5719f86b8ce68755be821fef9877794e-113x112.png&w=128&q=75)
### Cloud & Identity are Top Cyber Targets
The majority of attacks are now focused on identity, with theft of credentials or secrets or exploiting human error.
![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fy1ellg96%2Fproduction%2F75803df728b3ff6d5ec0a3a791fb28032c4c9384-113x112.png&w=128&q=75)
### Passwords, Secrets & VPNs Don't Scale
Engineers and security teams' interests are aligned, with both seeking easier, more secure ways to govern access.
![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fy1ellg96%2Fproduction%2Fd215c1d453e4b55d1f6a22059e18aa95fd27f27f-113x112.png&w=128&q=75)
### Compliance Needs Are Increasing
FedRAMP, HIPAA, SOC 2, SEC disclosure, and more. Customers need to scale how they meet regulatory requirements.
![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-lines.daa173a0.png&w=1200&q=75&dpl=13413460304)![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-lines.daa173a0.png&w=1200&q=75&dpl=13413460304)

## Problems Customers Solve with Teleport

### Improve Engineer & Workforce Productivity
  * Improve onboarding and offboarding
  * Eliminate access silos
  * Adopt on-demand and just-in-time access
  * Eliminate VPNs and bastion hosts
  * Unify user and machine access


![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fy1ellg96%2Fproduction%2F302b5e334fb68cb9abb2335060d845a7e4ceaed6-112x112.png&w=128&q=75)
### Protect Infrastructure from Identity Attacks
  * Eliminate credentials & standing privileges
  * Eliminate backdoor access paths
  * Monitor access patterns and respond
  * Apply policy/remediate instantly across all infrastructure

### Meet Compliance Requirements
  * FedRAMP

  * ISO 27001

## Problems Customers Solve with Teleport
![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fy1ellg96%2Fproduction%2Fac2b769f6e4ee03da63204811f2ce1112808c1b8-84x84.png&w=128&q=75)
### Improve Engineer & Workforce Productivity
  * Improve onboarding and offboarding
  * Eliminate access silos
  * Adopt on-demand and just-in-time access
  * Eliminate VPNs and bastion hosts
  * Unify user and machine access


![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fy1ellg96%2Fproduction%2F302b5e334fb68cb9abb2335060d845a7e4ceaed6-112x112.png&w=128&q=75)
### Protect Infrastructure from Identity Attacks
  * Eliminate credentials & standing privileges
  * Eliminate backdoor access paths
  * Monitor access patterns and respond
  * Apply policy/remediate instantly across all infrastructure


![](https://goteleport.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.sanity.io%2Fimages%2Fy1ellg96%2Fproduction%2F1902ecef87239121b16093fdcb551de381508c68-112x112.png&w=128&q=75)
### Meet Compliance Requirements
  * FedRAMP
  * SOC 2
  * HIPAA
  * PCI
  * ISO 27001

Teleport is a global provider of modern access platforms for infrastructure, improving efficiency of engineering teams, fortifying infrastructure against bad actors or error, and simplifying compliance and audit reporting. The Teleport Access Platform delivers on-demand, least privileged access to infrastructure on a foundation of cryptographic identity and zero trust, with built-in identity security and policy governance.

generated_description:
**Teleport: Simplifying Access to Infrastructure**

Founded in 2015 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S15, Teleport operates out of Oakland, California, with a team of around 200 dedicated employees. Their mission? To offer the "easiest, most secure way to access all your infrastructure." Initially starting as an open-source platform, Teleport has evolved into a robust Infrastructure Access Platform that empowers developers and security professionals alike. 

Teleport focuses on simplifying secure access to servers, Kubernetes, internal web apps, databases, and cloud provider APIs across various environments. Their offerings are particularly relevant today, as organizations grapple with security challenges and regulatory compliance. As cyber threats intensify, their approach emphasizes a zero-trust model and cryptographic identity, which bolsters infrastructure security while allowing for efficient operational practices.

**Key Features of Teleport:**
1. **Teleport Access Platform:** Offers on-demand, least-privileged access to infrastructure.
2. **Identity Governance:** Protects your systems with robust identity management.
3. **Policy Control:** Centralizes access policies and maintains governance across cloud environments.

**Why Teleport Stands Out:**
It addresses three significant concerns:
- **Eliminating Shadow Access:** By tackling the risks from SSH and API keys.
- **Enhancing Engineer Productivity:** With seamless onboarding and just-in-time access.
- **Supporting Compliance:** Their tools align with standards like FedRAMP, SOC 2, HIPAA, and more.

**Use Cases:**
Teleport's solutions cater to various industries, including e-commerce, financial services, SaaS providers, and healthcare. This versatility helps organizations secure access and comply with demanding regulations.

**Strategic Partnerships:**
Teleport collaborates with leading cloud providers, enhancing functionality and integration with existing infrastructures.

In summary, Teleport aims to modernize secure access to infrastructure, making it straightforward for teams to embrace security without sacrificing productivity. Interested in learning more? Check out their website at [goteleport.com](https://goteleport.com) for additional resources and insights into their offerings.
